= Installation steps =

If you want to commit or just modify this plugin for your needs, you need a development environment using following steps:
  # Create a work folder (C:\work\npmsdocs for example)
  # Check out mozilla sources into C:\work\npmsdocs\mozilla
  # Check out XUL runner SDK into C:\work\npmsdocs\xulrunner-sdk
  # Check out project code into C:\work\npmsdocs\msoffice-open
  # Open solution using Visual Studio 2008 in C:\work\npmsdocs\msoffice-open\npmsdocs.sln 

Beware: Debug cofiguration copies Debug\npmsdocs.dll into C:\Program Files\Mozilla Firefox\plugins
